name: Gallery Media Tags
author: Lenix

sections.description:
A tag gallery that allows each gallery image to tag and insert tags into pages by widgets or shortcode.

Shortcode Examples:

[gallery_tags]

Advanced Options:

    [gallery_tags tags="aaa,ttt" desktop-cols="3" img-size=thumbnail]

More Options:

    order=ASC/DESC
    orderby=date/title ect...
    tags="car,bike"
    desktop-cols=4
    mobile-cols=2
    full-size=large
    img-size=medium
    display=normal/masonry
sections.installation:
‪‪1. Download the Plugin.‬‬
‪‪2. Upload the zip file via the Plugin upload.‬‬
‪‪3. Activate the plugin.‬‬
‪‪4. Insert tags into media images.
5. Manage your gallery from your widgets or through shortcode.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Tweak! – Added options to display gallery by shortcode
  • Add Hebrew translation
  • Adde option to open image in Litebox

1.0

  • Initial Public Beta Release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

‪‪1. Download the Plugin.‬‬
‪‪2. Upload the zip file via the Plugin upload.‬‬
‪‪3. Activate the plugin.‬‬
‪‪4. Insert tags into media images.
5. Manage your gallery from your widgets or through shortcode.
